name: Rogue Account
description:
You are working as social media manager at a large government organization. Your job is to inform the public about the work and research done by your colleagues through a microblogging service. But a new administration ordered you to only write official, approved, statements that often contain misinformation or propaganda. While your supervisors follow the new guidelines, its up to you to resist and keep the public informed.

Move trough your office building with WASD, open chests and doors with E. If you encounter a government agent, press ENTER to use your phone and type the message on its screen to correct their claims before the time runs out.

By Micha, Jacob & Niklas
